text:
Can I please remind you to check in regularly on your PhD students via phone or email. They are vulnerable. Many (perhaps most) live alone with no family nearby. We supervisors are the closest they have to a family.

#AcademicTwitter 
#AcademicChatter 
#Coronavirus
